metadata.title: DUVAL COUNTY. JAMES FIGLAR 30(B)(6) DEPOSITION 8/15/11 DEFENSE VIDEOCLIPS USED.
metadata.description: Compilation of video clips used in Figlar deposition.Â Includes clips on warning labels, doubts about correlation of smoking and lung cancer, ad bans, interviews with Charles Dunlap and Hammond, news clips about Surgeon General Luther Terry.
